backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, listings, bookings, and related types with authorization, storage, and Stripe mixins for a backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items with feature metadata, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries for various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes with base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, SEO tags, favicon paths, and root app mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring routing, theming, and React Query providers for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for various property types with loading skeletons and animated UI cards.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityModa: Empty file placeholder for an availability modal component.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three‑step booking guide with icons and styled gradient cards based on listing category.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a category grid component.
frontend/src/components/ExploreSection.t: Empty file placeholder for an explore section component.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches and displays featured listings with loading skeletons and alternating card variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with logo, navigation links, legal links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with routing, login/logout handling, and conditional admin/user actions.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a hero section component.
Shows an interactive India map with animated city markers indicating active and coming‑soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the page with header, footer, routed content, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Renders a listing preview card with rating, availability, category icon, and dynamic styling variants. Handles navigation and computes display data via hooks.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: Displays a 3D‑animated listing card with image, rating, availability, and category icon. Uses hover effects and query hooks for listing data.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty placeholder file for a listing detail modal component.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Renders a styled map-like section with animated pins and floating badges sourced from event marker queries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving user profile data with form validation and API mutation.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Shows a status badge for property availability with icon and styling based on status enum.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Displays reviews for a listing and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Interactive or static star rating component supporting different sizes and click-to-rate behavior.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty placeholder file for testimonial bubble UI.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadge.tsx: React component rendering a stylized trust badge with variants and gradients using SVG and dynamic sizing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and tracks a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, listings, reviews, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with OKLCH color variables, typography, dark mode, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wraps it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Static About Us page describing the company, registration details, and leadership with styled UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard fetching admin data, managing submissions, notifications, charges, and quick-publish actions with access control.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Static booking policy page displaying disclaimers and terms with styled sections and scrollable content.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Category selection page showing accommodation categories and navigating to filtered listings on click.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage rendering categories, stay types, lazy‑loaded map and counters, and navigation to listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Listing browser with category filtering, fetching listings by category, and lazy‑loaded cards and map.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled privacy policy page with scrollable sections describing data practices and user privacy commitments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the logged-in user's profile, handling form state, saving updates, and logout actions.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Provides CRUD tools for owners to create, edit, and manage property listings tied to their identity.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Allows the public to submit property listings with validation, image uploads, and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicyPage.tsx: Shows a styled refund policy page explaining conditions for refunds on the unlock fee.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Renders a styled Terms & Conditions page with scrollable sections, disclaimers, and visual UI elements using custom components.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Handles unlocking property contact details, fetching listing data, showing ratings, and providing call/WhatsApp/download actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage helpers and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the project’s design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing branding asset requirements, known issues, and feature tasks related to STYO logo and favicon fixes.
